reviewText: Poorly done video, they did not have a boom mic or use lapel microphones. Echo.  I think they use only 1 camera so for some techniques you could not see what they were doing.

This DVD is essentially the same as the narrator/demonstrator's other Hawaiian Massage for Women video. The difference is that he is showing a married couple how to perform Lomi Lomi massage. The husband is a body-builder type who is cuter than the guy teaching him the techniques.

The sound quality is awful. When the wife/model says something to the two guys you cannot hear a word she speaks. The camera stays pretty much stationary throughout.

The setting, unlike the other video, is indoors.

If you are interested in Lomi Lomi massage techniques, buy a different video.
